content:
the president’s authority as commander in chief is exercised through emergency powers; emergency powers are derived from the role of commander in chief

they take an oath of office to preserve, protect, and defend the constitution of the united states
	we don’t know what that is going to be; could they have predicted airplane attacks? no
	the president is going to have flexible authority to address whatever comes

(side note) Sometimes the president goes too far
	eg japanese internment camps
